member.name: T:Leadtools.Controls.ControlScrollMode
member.summary: Determines how the control displays and uses scrollbars.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Controls.ControlScrollMode.Auto
member.summary: (0) Auto scrollbars, if the control requires scroll bars they will be visible and active.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Controls.ControlScrollMode.Disabled

member.name: T:Leadtools.Controls.ControlSizeMode
member.summary: Determines how the control displays the image and the automatic adjustments of the display rectangles.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Controls.ControlSizeMode.Fit
member.summary: (2) Fit the image into the viewing area while maintaining the aspect ratio. If the image size is smaller than the viewing area, no resizing is done.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Controls.ControlSizeMode.FitAlways
member.summary: (3) Always fit the image into the viewing area while maintaining the aspect ratio even if the image size is smaller than the viewing area (in which case, the image will be scaled up).

member.name: F:Leadtools.Controls.ControlSizeMode.FitWidth
member.summary: (4) Fit the image width to be the size of the width of the viewing area while maintaining the aspect ratio.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Controls.ControlSizeMode.FitHeight
member.summary: (5) Fit the image height to be the size of the height of the viewing area while maintaining the aspect ratio.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Controls.ControlSizeMode.Stretch
member.summary: (6) Fit the image to fill the viewing area. Aspect ratio might not be maintained.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Controls.ControlInertiaScrollOptions
member.summary: Options to use with inertia scroll support.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Controls.ControlInertiaScrollOptions.Clone
member.summary: Creates an exact copy of this ControlInertiaScrollOptions.
member.returns: The newly created object.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Controls.ControlInertiaScrollOptions.CreateDefault
member.summary: Creates a new instance of ControlInertiaScrollOptions with default options.
member.returns: The newly created object.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Controls.ControlInertiaScrollOptions.CalculateInertia
member.summary: When non-null, used to calculate the inertia scroll offset.
member.value: A [CalculateInertiaCallback] that will calculate the inertia scroll deceration offsets. The default value is [DefaultCalculateInertia]. If **null**, [DefaultCalculateInertia] is used.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Controls.ControlInertiaScrollOptions.DefaultBezierPoint1
member.summary: The second point for the default cubic Bézier inertia function.
member.value: A [LeadPointD] marking the second of four Bézier control points. The default value is `(0.0, 0.9)`.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Controls.ControlInertiaScrollOptions.DefaultBezierPoint2
member.summary: The third point for the default cubic Bézier inertia function.
member.value: A [LeadPointD] marking the third of four Bézier control points. The default value is `(0.3, 1.0)`.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Controls.ControlInertiaScrollOptions.DefaultCalculateInertia
member.summary: The default inertia calculation function.
member.value: A [CalculateInertiaCallback] that uses a cubic Bézier function to calculate the inertia scroll offsets.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Controls.ControlInertiaScrollOptions.DefaultDuration
member.summary: The time in milliseconds for the default inertia scroll to last.
member.value: An `int` indicating the duration in milliseconds. The default value is `2500`.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Controls.ControlInertiaScrollOptions.DefaultPower
member.summary: A multiplier for the distance of the default inertia scroll.
member.value: A double indicating a multiplier for the inertial distance. The default value is `8`.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Controls.ControlInertiaScrollOptions.IsEnabled
member.summary: Indicates if inertia scrolling should be used.
member.value: **true** if inertia scrolling should be used, otherwise; **false**. Default value is **false**.
